about_the_game:
Available Models in the Taxi DLC:

  • Liner Navigator – an American street legend and an enduring symbol of New York taxis.

  • CAB Roamer – a classic British taxi with iconic styling and unmatched maneuverability.

  • Olsen Pramie Club – a luxurious German taxi that combines elegance with reliability.

  • Lacroix Marseille – available in two versions: classic French model with sleek lines and a comfortable interior, perfect for city streets and a unique special edition! 

  • Sakura Tiara– an icon of Japanese taxis, celebrated for its dependability and comfort.

  • Bolt Escapade Mk IV – a popular choice in the USA, known for its spaciousness and comfortable ride.

    DLC also includes a selection of 8 customizable taxi roof lights for you to choose from! Select from a range of modern and classic styles inspired by different regions around the world, including the USA, Germany, the UK, Japan and France.
    Tailor each taxi to suit your style and bring a touch of international flair!
